content: >http://www.theglobeandmail.com/servlet/story/RTGAM.20090515.wgitmo0515/BNStory/International/home President Obama announced to-day that the US was going to take another 'stab' at Military Tribunals for Gitmo detainees. The *new*improved* tribunals are being designed to be seen to be 'just' by barring any evidence derived from torture, and by allowing detainees to select their own lawyers. The tribunals will allow 'hearsay' evidence providing the Army can prove it came from a 'trustworthy' source. Since most of the latter evidence comes from material supposedly relayed to 'friendly' guards, the prosecution should be a 'slam-dunk'. Left out of the cakewalk, however, are the greater number of detainees about which no evidence exists and those who are known to be innocent but who can't be safely released. Remaining unanswered, as well, are questions relating to those who might actually win their case. President Obama is not only applying lipstick to GWB's porker. To make America look good he's giving Ms Piggy a complete makeover.
